name: Big Cow
description:
In this platformer, collect shakes, milk, and beans in efforts to be a big bodybuilder, but it looks like it makes you a big cow!
Controls: Arrow, WASD, and Mouse

Secrets+Cheats:
When an enemy dies or a bean is collected the loot drop rotates to the next item in a 20 item list.
The White and Pink star closest to the highest barn unlock all level and increase shake amount respectively.
